VISUAL ELEMENTS.composition_type: Medium shot (from waist up) of a single woman on the right side; text and graphics fill the left.

human_presence.demographics: Adult woman, medium skin tone, black hair, wearing red and beige traditional clothing.

main_objects/props_featured: Circular logo with pregnant woman icon and text ('MASTER CLASSES ON PREGNANCY')
VISUAL ELEMENTS.background_environment: Flat, two-tone gradient background with shades of pink and lavender; clean and clinical with no distracting elements.

font_characteristics.style: Bold, all caps, sans-serif, black font with white block background.
Bold, all caps, sans-serif, red font on white background within a circular calendar motif.
Bold, all caps, sans-serif, red font with black outline.
All caps, white font, curved around a maroon emblem.

text_placement_within_frame.BEST DAYS TO GET PREGNANT: Left side, stacked vertically occupying the majority of the left half.
text_placement_within_frame.FERTILE PERIOD: Top center, to the right of main text.
text_placement_within_frame.3M+ VIEWS: Bottom left, inside a white bubble.
text_placement_within_frame.MASTER CLASSES ON PREGNANCY / MAITRI: Bottom right, wrapped around a round logo.

visual_metaphors_or_symbols: Circular badge with days and highlight mimicking an ovulation tracker/calendar
clickbait_techniques_employed: Large, bold text promising 'best days' (exclusive tips)
Highlight of '3M+ VIEWS' for social proof
Professional appearance of woman implies expertise

visual_reinforcement: Both thumbnail and title reference 'Best Days To Get Pregnant'
'FERTILE PERIOD' visually connects to the 'best days' claim in the title
Presence of a professional (doctor) matches the title's use of 'Dr Anjali Kumar'
contrasts_or_mismatches: No significant contrasts or mismatches. Both are cohesive and directly related.
